string.value: In order to start Bing Machine - Alpha, you must go to the future and bring back some Crystanol. \r\nUse the Time Machine located in the room next to Doctor Bing and travel to the future. \r\nTo the future! That's pretty crazy...
You're finally able to equip the Bing Machine! Now all that is left is to defeat the aliens.
Finally! The Time Machine is complete! Isn't it grand?! \r\n#L0##bHmm, I mean, I helped build it and all, but can this dinky thing really let us travel through time?#l\n#k
It certainly can! Don't be deceived by appearances. I never am... This machine works. I've already sent several people into the future with it.\r\n#L0##b(And have any of them returned?)#l\n#k

Now, enough chat. The Crystanol from the future is calling to us. Can't you hear it? Go and retrieve it. If you don't, who knows what might happen to Maple World.\r\n#L0##bThat's true, but... (This Time Machine just doesn't look safe.)#l\n#k
Well!? Are you going or not!?
Wonderful! Now, board the #b<Time Machine>#k next to me by clicking on it. Please be careful. Who knows what you'll run into in the future...
Ye of little faith! Maple World will suffer because of your decision!
You've returned!!\r\n#L0##bHuff, huff... Yes, I've come back.#l\n#k
So how was the future? \r\n#L0##bNot good. Maple World has been completely invaded by aliens. It was quite disturbing...#l\n#k
Ah yes. I've heard the same report from others. We must change that future. We must defeat the aliens!\r\n#L0##bMy thoughts exactly!#l\n#k
All right, then. Hand me that #b#t4001458##k you brought back so I can put it into the Bing Machine-Alpha.\r\n#L0##bHere you go.#l\n#k

With this, the Bing Machine-Alpha should now be operational.

#b(Doctor Bing puts the Crystanol Fragment inside the Bing Machine-Alpha.)
#L0##bAfter all the work, I'll finally be able to equip the Bing Machine.#l
#k
It's powered on! \r\nGo on! Take the Bing Machine-Alpha.
Like the design?\r\nGo ahead and equip it.
Hurry and click the #b<Time Machine>#k so you can travel to the future!\r\nMaple World is in your hands.
(Oh, almost forgot. #b#p9250130##k should be told about the Energy Laboratory...)
